name: Barbell Hip Thrust
description: Place the bar over your hips, look forward and raise the weights. Your knees should be in a 90 degrees angle at the top of the exercise. Tuck your chin in to your chest during the exerise, look forward, push from your heels

name: Barbell Sumo Deadlift
description: You should have a bit wider stance for this exercise compared to regular deadlifts. Remember to not bend your bakc during the exercise, since it may cause injury. Lift with your legs at the bottom of the exercise and stabilize with the back

name: Leg Extension Machine
description: So not overstretch or bend your back at the top of the exercise. Stop in the top position where your back is straight. Trick: Point toes outward a bit, which makes it easier to feel the contract.

name: Barbell Bench Press
description: Lower the weight diwb ti cgest kevek and then press upwards while extending your arms.

name: Double Incline Chest Press
description: A great chest press variation that will put some extra pressure in the top of your chest and front shoulders.

name: Barbell Shoulder Presses
description: Have relaxed and tucked down shoulders in the start position. Push your chest slightly forward and contract you scapulas in the back.

name: Weighted Plate Front Raises
description: Holding a plate with your hads with somewhat straight hands and raise the up and down.

name: Warm Up
description: Run, Jog, do what ever and warm up your body
